name: Seeking Dawn
description: Welcome to Seeking Dawn, a multiplayer survival VR adventure that takes you far beyond the solar system. Step into the shoes of a soldier discovering a hostile planet, where predators roam free and enemies are ruthless.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 10 64bit Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7500 (3.4GHz and above) / AMD FX™-8320 (3.5GHz and above) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 290X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 25 GB available space Additional Notes: OS Version depends on the headset model
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 10 64bit Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700 (3.4GHz and above) / AMD FX™-9370 (4.4GHz and above) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 Fury X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 25 GB available space Additional Notes: OS Version depends on the headset model
